experience: You and Sheran both know Max Hansen, Amanda Vega, and 81 others

Train and certify coaches in Spirit Centered Coaching. Six-month program offers skills in developing a career in coaching. Developing and marketing a practice your practice is part of the program. This unique approach to coaching focuses on the growth of the practitioner in order to provide breakthrough coaching experiences for clients.Spirit Centered Coaches choose their own niche and begin coaching during the program.

Business and life coaching focusing on improving the quality of life both personally and professionally. Programs are customized to each client. Master Minds, workshops, laser coaching on the phone or face to face are offered.
Facilitator of Change and Builder of Relationships

Strategic planning for both not for profit and corporate environments. Support partnership development with community and educational organizations. Curriculum development, career development, life skill development. Staff and Team training to increase effectiveness. Work with diverse popultations: executive leadership, prisoner reentry programs, those with limited education and experience and those making transition in executive positions.Additional experience in spiritual healing and energy work.

Client effectivness in defining and landing the job and career that matches one's values, strengths, and vision for the future. Supported diverse corporate and not for profit individuals and leadership. Trained in MBTI, Birkman First Look, Change Management. Selected to train all new adjunct faculty in corporate culture, delivery, and branding of Right Management.

Supported staff development, managed special projects, designed extensive curriculum in Life Skills and Career Management, retreat oversight, and delivered training to program participants. Participant base included: corporate settings, youth, career reentry, executive leadership, prisoner reentry, currently incarcerated, those entering the workforce for the first time, and victims of DV.

recommendations: Tracy Berrian
Making a difference in client wellness
September 14, 2012, Tracy was a client of Sheran’s

Sheran is truly a dynamic life coach, career coach, and resume specialist. Her services made all the difference after I left my previous job with the goal of starting a new career. She provided me with invaluable tools to help me determine my new path, assisted me in getting my name out there through the creation of a Linkedin profile, information referral meetings, and networking in general, and created a powerful new resume for me. At times when I felt overwhelmed by the whole job search process, she gave me exercises to keep me from getting stuck, and provided hope and encouragement to keep pressing on. Whether it was face-to-face in her office or through phone calls or email, she helped me along every step of the way. I am proud to say, thanks to Sheran's help, I received a job offer (on the spot!) after interviewing with my #1 choice of employers. I am so very grateful to have been coached along by such a professional, caring, and dedicated woman. If you are looking for guidance for your career, or just life in general, Sheran is the best coach you'll find, and I look forward to using her services again in the future as I need them.
Tracy Berrian

Executive Director at Tempe Community Action Agency
July 27, 2011, Deborah was a client of Sheran’s

I worked with Sheran over a several year period as she performed Project Consulting work for AWEE. Sheran was hired to develop curriculum for adult learners, train facilitators, and design/deliver specialized services to clients. Sheran is the best in her field. Without exception, Sheran delivered the best quality work, on time, and with great sensitivity to the organization and clients' needs. She is the supreme professional. Her integrity, subject matter expertise, and intuitiveness added tremendous value to the organization. I highly recommend Sheran.

Karen Beckford
Combining passion and innovation to ignite change
June 14, 2017, Karen worked with Sheran in the same group

Karen is a developer of people and projects. She is skilled at managing multiple priorities at one time while attending to quality, time lines and those she manages. Karen implemented numerous challenging programs with ever changing requirements. She created community relationships and partnerships for the mutual benefit of all involved. The commitment to maintaining confidentiality and clear communication are part of Karen's approach to team work. Outlining and meeting goals are a consistent  theme of projects that Karen coordinates.I have enjoyed Karen's creativity, positive approach to life, and willingness to take appropriate risks. She is dedicated and follows through.

Karen is an effective communicator who is organized and focused. I had the opportunity to work with Karen on diverse projects where she provided clear expectations and outcomes. She identified the needs of the population to be served and assisted staff with specific goals and standards to be met. Karen met time lines and assured that corporate, vendor and client needs were addressed. I knew that I would have all I needed to assist the client and I was kept informed of changing priorities. Karen can be counted on to bring quality to any project.

summary: Business energizer coach who helps individuals build businesses and lives they love each and every day. Figuring out and clearing what gets in the way of success and a life of purpose with powerful relationships. Have you ever felt stuck? I help you figure out how to get moving towards enjoyable success with positive relationships that bring fun into your life. Achieve remarkable success in living with purpose, health and abundance. I have a multitude of processes to help you-some traditional and some based on current research in the power of our body, brain connection!!! Take advantage of one of the few complementary sessions each month to determine a step by step plan to move forward. Contact me to see if there is an opening this month!Here are some tools and expertise I have available to use: Release of Money BlocksFacilitation and Strategic Planning CertificationEnergy Psychology Advanced EFT CertificationThe Phoenix EffectBrain Education CertificationRetreat DeliveryCareer Coaching CertificationLife Coach TrainingEntertaining and Educational Speaking ExperiencePartnership Development in Education and Corporate Settings Offer Spirit Centered Coach Certification for those who want a new careerState Representative for Association for Comprehensive Energy Psychology. Developer of Master Mind Groups for Extraordinary Businesses!Author of Maintaining Balance in a Wobbly World
